item.title: Application Delivery
item.description: Target Goals 1 - Connect all of the software delivery activities to measurable business outcomes. 2 - Empower application operators to deploy services, both stateless and stateful, without human intervention In order to achieve the above goals, the focus for the application delivery framework should be flow over siloed specializations. The open source OAM spec will be used as the foundational building block on which the framework will be built upon.
